input_Control

类 MenuButtonHoverController

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
      • input_Control.MenuButtonHoverController
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class MenuButtonHoverController
extends java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
    the mouse adapter that change the color the font of a text of a button, when the mouse hover over the button
    作者:
    Leo

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      MenuButtonHoverController(javax.swing.JButton button)
      Constructor method

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void mouseEntered(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      when the mouse entered the button, change the font color and font
      void mouseExited(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      when the mouse exited the button, change the font color and font
      void mousePressed(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      when the mouse pressed in the box of the button, change the font color and font
      void mouseReleased(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      when the mouse is released in the box of the button, change the font color and font

      • 从类继承的方法 java.awt.event.MouseAdapter

        mouseClicked, mouseDragged, mouseMoved, mouseWheelMoved

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        Constructor method
        参数:
        button - the buttons that need the font changed when mouse hover over
